name: EKEventViewController
desc: A view controller for displaying existing calendar and reminder events, and for optionally editing those events.

items.name: protocol EKEventViewDelegate
items.desc: Delegates used to display details for calendar events.

items.name: var event: EKEvent!
items.desc: The event this view controller displays to the user.

items.name: var allowsCalendarPreview: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that determines whether the user can preview the event in a calendar day.

items.name: var allowsEditing: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that determines whether the user may edit the event.
